QuestData.Title: Brood of Seldarria
QuestData.Description: <The Gnomecorder buzzes.>$B$BBe very careful, $n. You do not want to rouse that black dragon.$B$BNow, look around you. If this is a nest then there must be black dragon eggs nearby. Search the premises for eggs and destroy any that you see.$B$BReturn to me should you find and destroy Seldarria's eggs.$B$BGoldrinn watch over you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Maintain caution. A misstep here could be disastrous.
QuestData.RewardText: A smashing success! Perhaps only a minor victory against the brood of Deathwing, but a victory nonetheless!
